scripts.uglifyjs-vendor-common: npm run vue-prod && uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/common/*.js assets/js/vendor/common/jquery-plugins/*.js -o assets/js/vendor/common.min.js -c -m
scripts.uglifyjs-main: uglifyjs assets/js/vfs-global.js assets/js/config.js assets/js/all-countries-data.js assets/js/vue-app.js assets/js/main.js -o assets/js/script.min.js -c -m
scripts.create-build-txt: echo This website has been successfully built > build.txt
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-final-step
scripts.build-all: npm run build-js && npm run custom-build && npm run build-final-step
scripts.concatjs-vendor: npm run vue-dev && ncat assets/js/vendor/common/*.js assets/js/vendor/common/jquery-plugins/*.js -o assets/js/vendor/common.min.js
scripts.concatjs-main: ncat assets/js/vfs-global.js assets/js/config.js assets/js/all-countries-data.js assets/js/vue-app.js assets/js/main.js -o assets/js/script.min.js
scripts.create-and-concatjs-data: npm run create-data-js && npm run concatjs-main
scripts.semi-dev: npm-run-all create-data-js del-build-txt && npm-run-all concatjs-* copyjs-*
scripts.dev: npm run semi-dev && npm run del-data-js
